A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It had some entertaining scenes but's that's only worth half a star because the film is awful. The usual laziness we get these days with films\, the bad writing\, the lack of a proper story and pretty much no new ideas just copying stuff seems a lot worse with this film. A truly shocking idea to have the resistance pretty much destroyed in this film\, which has probably already ruined the next film where we'll see a ridiculously unrealistic comeback that ends too quick with some sort of miracle I reckon. The old Star Wars was winning against the odds with clever tactics\, this one they come across as incompetent.
